column6: My place is close to restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, public transport, nightlife. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the ambiance and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).\nThis listing is for a single room with queen size bed, closet, TV with lots of cable channels, writing desk / chair and dresser. Guests also have access to kitchen, dining room, living room, area pool, tennis courts and area amenities.
